foreignData.name: Gesalzene Erde
foreignData.text: Entferne ein Nichtstandardland Deiner Wahl ganz aus dem Spiel. Durchsuche den Friedhof, die Bibliothek und die Karten auf der Hand des Beherrschers dieses Lands nach Kopien dieser Karte und entferne diese ganz aus dem Spiel. Dieser Spieler mischt seine Bibliothek danach.

name: Sowing Salt
originalText: Remove target nonbasic land from the game. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all copies of that card and remove them from the game. That player then shuffles his or her library.

rulings.text: Does not exile other cards of the same name that are on the battlefield. Just from the graveyard, hand, and library.
The copies must be found if they are in publicly viewable zones. Finding copies while searching private zones is optional.

text: Exile target nonbasic land. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that land and exile them. Then that player shuffles.
